scripts.start: echo 'ADD YOUR GITHUB TOKEN TO src/environments/environment.ts' && ng serve -o
scripts.deploy:gh-pages: ng build --prod --output-path docs --base-href /github-search/ && cp docs/index.html docs/404.html && git add . && git commit -m 'deploy app' && git push origin master
scripts.deploy:netlify: npm run-script replace-variables && npx ngssc wrap-aot ng build --prod
scripts.invalidate-cache: aws --profile personal configure set preview.cloudfront true && aws cloudfront create-invalidation --distribution-id <CLOUDFRONT_DISTRIBUTION_ID> --paths '/*'
scripts.deploy: ng build --prod --es5-browser-support=false && aws --profile personal s3 sync dist/github-search s3://my-github-search.io --delete
